welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kelowna, a charming city nestled in the heart of British Columbia's Okanagan Valley. Known for its stunning vineyards, scenic lakes, and outdoor adventure, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kelowna has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: The Bread Co
restaurants.description: The Bread Co is a bakery located in Kelowna.

restaurants.name: Bohemian Cafe
restaurants.description: Bohemian Cafe is a breakfast spot located in Kelowna.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kelowna Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Kelowna Airport primarily serves smaller regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vernon Regional Airport handles all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Vernon Regional Airport is used by private and charter aircraft and offers a comfortable waiting area for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Penticton Airport serves all commercial flights and provides basic amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Penticton Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
